.. highlight:: shell

============
Installation
============

..
    Stable release
    --------------

    To install ``orbconformal``, run this command in your terminal:

    .. code-block:: console

        $ pip install orbconformal

    This is the preferred method to install ``orbconformal``, as it will always install the most recent stable release.

    If you don't have `pip`_ installed, this `Python installation guide`_ can guide
    you through the process.

    .. _pip: https://pip.pypa.io
    .. _Python installation guide: http://docs.python-guide.org/en/latest/starting/installation/


From sources
------------

The source for ``orbconformal`` can be downloaded from the `Github repo`_.

You can either clone the public repository:

.. code-block:: console

    $ git clone git://github.com/benjaminleroy/orb-tc-conformal/package/orbconformal

Or download the `tarball`_:

.. code-block:: console

    $ curl  -OL https://github.com/benjaminleroy/orb-tc-conformal/package/orbconformal/tarball/main

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it. The method of installation will depend on the packaging library being used.

..
    For example, if `setuptools`_ is being used (a ``setup.py`` file is present), install ``orbconformal`` with:

    .. code-block:: console

        $ python setup.py install

If `poetry`_ is being used (``poetry.lock`` and ``pyproject.toml`` files are present), install ``orbconformal`` with:

.. code-block:: console

    $ poetry install


.. _Github repo: https://github.com/benjaminleroy/orb-tc-conformal/package/orbconformal
.. _tarball: https://github.com/benjaminleroy/orb-tc-conformal/package/orbconformal/tarball/master
.. _poetry: https://python-poetry.org
.. _setuptools: https://setuptools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
